entry.title: Chapter 01 - Introduction to Python for Finance

link.title: Chapter 01 - Introduction to Python for Finance

entry.summary: Introduction to Python for Finance Dive into data science using Python and learn how to effectively analyze and visualize your data. No coding experience or skills needed. Course Description Begin your journey into Data Science! Even if you’ve never written a line of code in your life, you’ll be able to follow this course and witness the power of Python to perform Data Science. You’ll use data...

entry.title: Chapter 02 - Intermediate Python
entry.summary: Intermediate Python Level up your data science skills by creating visualizations using Matplotlib and manipulating DataFrames with pandas. Course Description Learning Python is crucial for any aspiring data science practitioner. Learn to visualize real data with Matplotlib’s functions and get acquainted with data structures such as the dictionary and pandas DataFrame. This four-hour intermedia...

entry.title: Create a website on Github using Jekyll

link.title: Create a website on Github using Jekyll

entry.summary: Create a website like this one on Github using Jekyll! As this website is fairly new, it would be appropriate to share how I created this website using readily available and free services. Quick Start Firstly, Jekyll Docs provides instructions to install Ruby, RubyGems, Jekyll, and Bundler. You will also need to install Git Step 1 - Find a theme There are many different paid and free themes ...
